summary: In 1976, complex political and emotional forces are set in motion when a young man returns to the race-torn Philadelphia neighborhood where he came of age during the Black Power movement.
cast: Anthony Mackie|Jamara Griffin|Sadiq Afif|Shango Rich|Kerry Washington|Ron Simons|Tariq Trotter|Damali Mason|Jann Ellis|Thomas Roy|Amari Cheatom|William Zielinski|Christopher Kadish|Jamie Hector|Nakia Dillard|Wendell Pierce|Matthew Russell|Israel Johnson|Steve Kaufmann|Art Lyle|Tariq Rasheed|Kevin C. Walls|Whitney Wilcox|Tom Leonard
keywords: f rated|black panther party|black panthers|philadelphia pennsylvania|1970s
title: Night Catches Us
